mapper.insert: insert into lg_vehicleinspection (vehicleOperationId, verificationItems, verificationTime, nexttrialTime, nextAuditStatus, remarks1, remarks2) values (#{vehicleoperationid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{verificationitems,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{verificationtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{nexttrialtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{nextauditstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remarks1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks2,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update lg_vehicleinspection set verificationItems = #{verificationitems,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, verificationTime = #{verificationtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, nexttrialTime = #{nexttrialtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, nextAuditStatus = #{nextauditstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remarks1 = #{remarks1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks2 = #{remarks2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where vehicleOperationId = #{vehicleoperationid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select vehicleOperationId, verificationItems, verificationTime, nexttrialTime, nextAuditStatus, remarks1, remarks2 from lg_vehicleinspection where vehicleOperationId = #{vehicleoperationid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select vehicleOperationId, verificationItems, verificationTime, nexttrialTime, nextAuditStatus, remarks1, remarks2 from lg_vehicleinspection
